name: Chaser of Dawn
description:
Your spaceship just crashed on a tiny planet! In this strange world, the day is burning hot and the night is freezing cold. Stay in between to survive, and repair your engine to escape.

The sun will transform objects into other elements, for example, a tree will become coal. Make sure to loop around the planet to gather resources!

Some objects can only be mined with certain types of pickaxes. Make sure to upgrade your pickaxe by pressing X. 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • C - Mine/Select
  • X - Crafting
  • Enter - Pause

Credits:

  • Arkanyota - Code
  • Théobosse - Code
  • Yolwoocle (Léo Bernard) - Art and Code
  • Elza  - Sounds
  • Raphaël - Logo Art
